publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3 Stewart Stevenson: Cod Crusaders—That the Parliament congratulates the "Cod Crusaders" on their campaign in support of the Scottish fishing industry and welcomes their success in keeping the issue of the damage done to our communities by the present Common Fisheries Policy at the forefront of political debate.

S2M-3 Stewart Stevenson: Cod Crusaders—That the Parliament congratulates the "Cod Crusaders" on their campaign in support of the Scottish fishing industry and welcomes their success in keeping the issue of the damage done to our communities by the present Common Fisheries Policy at the forefront of political debate.
S2M-3 Cod Crusaders (lodged on 7 May 2003) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3 Cod Crusaders (lodged on 7 May 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3 Cod Crusaders (lodged on 7 May 2003) Mr David Davidson*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, John Scott*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-3 Cod Crusaders (lodged on 7 May 2003) Shona Robison*
S2M-3 Cod Crusaders (lodged on 7 May 2003) Brian Adam*
